name: yolo-v3-node
description: Yolo V3 implementation for usage in node. Based on https://github.com/zqingr/tfjs-yolov3/blob/master/README_EN.md

scripts.install-debs-raspberry: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install build-essential libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev librsvg2-dev

author: Kevin Van den Abeele <kevin.vandenabeele@gmail.com>
